lines.i: The physical process by which the complete delivery was effected. The template captures information about: a) attempted use of forceps, b) attempted delivery with vacuum extraction, c) fetal presentation at birth, d) final route and method of delivery, e) attempted trial of labor (if Cesarean delivery). Within a fetal death report, information about hysterotomy/Hysterectomy is collected as well.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:284)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:282)/@code="72149-8" Delivery method (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:283)
A code value that indicates the nature of the procedure, that it records the method of delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:321)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:323)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:322)/@code="73761-9" Fetal presentation at birth (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - fetal presentation.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:324), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Presentations 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7113 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:325)
Information on the presentation of the fetus at the point of delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:290)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:292)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:291)/@code="73762-7" Final route and method of delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the method and route of delivery.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:293), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Delivery Routes 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7118 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:294)
The method and route of delivery.
This entryRelationship MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
If the newborn has been delivered by Cesarean section, the report must record whether a trial of labor was attempted.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:296)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:298)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:300)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:299)/@code="73760-1" If cesarean, a trial of labor was attempted (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
Indicates the observation contains information on a trial of labor.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:301)
Information on whether, in the case of a Casearean delivery, a trial of labor was attempted.
If the newborn has been delivered by Cesarean section, the report must record whether a trial of labor was attempted.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:315)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:316)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:317)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:319)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:318)/@code="73759-3" Hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed at delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:320)
Information to identify whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed as a method of delivering the fetus.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:284)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:282)/@code="72149-8" Delivery method (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:283)
A code value that indicates the nature of the procedure, that it records the method of delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:321)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:323)

A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - fetal presentation.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:324), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Fetal Presentations 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7113 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:325)
Information on the presentation of the fetus at the point of delivery.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:290)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:292)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:291)/@code="73762-7" Final route and method of delivery (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - the method and route of delivery.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:293), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Delivery Routes 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.7118 STATIC December 1, 2013 (CONF:294)
The method and route of delivery.
This entryRelationship MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
If the newborn has been delivered by Cesarean section, the report must record whether a trial of labor was attempted.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:296)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:298)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:300)

Indicates the observation contains information on a trial of labor.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:301)
Information on whether, in the case of a Casearean delivery, a trial of labor was attempted.
If the newborn has been delivered by Cesarean section, the report must record whether a trial of labor was attempted.

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:317)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:319)

body.codeblock: <procedure xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <id root="MDHT" extension="312095826"/> <code code="1332321058"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="73759-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed at delivery"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </procedure>
